title: The Martyrdom of Saint John the Baptist
story: On this day, the Church commemorates the martyrdom of Saint John the Baptist, the forerunner of the Lord. He rebuked King Herod for his unlawful marriage, and for this witness he was imprisoned and beheaded.

title: The Departure of Saint Theodora the Nun
story: Saint Theodora repented with tears and humility, disguising herself as a monk and bearing unjust reproach for many years. God revealed her righteousness after her departure and granted healing through her prayers.
